alert.note: Alert for Faulk; Spink (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 18 at 1:46AM MST until January 19 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM THIS MORNING TO 6 AM CST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow expected. Total snow accumulations around two inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. Wind chill values ranging from 25 below to 30 below zero tonight. * WHERE...Faulk and Spink Counties. * WHEN...From 6 AM this morning to 6 AM CST Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. The cold wind chills as low as 25 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
